messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.

messages.title: Help the Lib Dems win
messages.content: Please help Mark Dyson and the local Lib Dems win for Ipswich people by filling in and returning this form.

messages.title: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
messages.content: Nick Clegg's tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn—cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Implementing a tax plan to ensure no tax on the first £10,000 earned, aiming to reduce tax bills by £700.

images.caption: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.
